content: Analyze the data in the provided CSV files.
Compare the performance of Eastern European countries (like Soviet Union, East Germany, Romania, Poland, Hungary) versus Western countries in the medal table.
Identify any outliers in the medal distribution. Are there countries with an unusually high number of silver or bronze medals compared to their gold medal count?
Calculate the total number of medals awarded in the competition and determine which country took home the largest percentage of the total pool.
